channel.title: [508] Question
channel.description:
I'm on the brink of hosting for the public a [508] I created, and I was just wondering if they need an auto-restarter? If they do, where could I get one? If not, never mind.
Thanks in advance.

item.title: [508] Question
item.dc:creator: @the_soul The Soul
item.description:
@the_soul wrote:

Use Graham’s base and you won’t need one :P. Server restarters are inconveniant in all ways in give the answer to whether or not your server is nice, or it’s shit.

Read full topic
